JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Machine joiner for a company in Hadsten
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
About the job

For our customer in Hadsten, we are looking for Machine and Cabinetmakers. Either skilled or well trained, for wood production. This position is temporary but with the possibiliy of permanent employment.

The customer`s machinery consists, among other things of: Sav, NEST, CNC-machines, and ABD.

In this job, there are many exciting and complex furniture solutions in both small and large sizes.

Your profile

You are a trained Cabinetmaker, a Machine joiner or you can document similar qualifications from the fixture/furniture industry.

In addition, you have:

  • Experience with furniture/plate production
  • Experience with working in various materials, such as laminate plates, melamine, MDF, solid wood, glass, etc.
  • Knowledge of industry machinery
  • Sense for accuracy and quality

We expect you to:

  • Have a good drive and moral
  • Can work independently with drawings and instructions
  • Be an open and outgoing person
  • Be a stable employee and responsible
  • Be ready for the new tasks every day
  • Be detail-oriented and deliver high-quality results

In return for your good work, we offer:

  • A possibility for permanent employment
  • An exciting and varied workday
  • Interesting challenges with the latest technology
  • A team of good colleagues - with mutual respect

 

 

Working hours & practical info:

There will be start-up as soon as possible

Working hours: Monday to Thursday from 07.30-15.15. Friday 07.00-14.45.

Are you interested?

If you’re interested in the position, we recommend that you send your application immediately. We hire on an ongoing basis.

The customer`s machinery consists, among other things of: Sav, NEST, CNC-machines, and ABD.

In this job, there are many exciting and complex furniture solutions in both small and large sizes.
